title: Integrated winbox.exe clients are used to manage ROS devices
author: zzjeagle
body_snippet:
Hello,

Can this tool integrate the winbox.exe client, which is used to manage the use of the MikroTik Routers router.

I add external expansion tools to mRemoteNG, configure corresponding parameters and add route devices to double-click the device to connect successfully, but is the form of new window pop-up, can the window be embedded in mRemoteNG software? It will be more convenient to manage a lot of route devices if they can. Can external extensions implement integration?

![1](https:...

iterations.description: The issue only contains a high-level enhancement title without requirements, expected behavior, or integration details needed to scope implementation.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The issue only contains a high-level enhancement title without requirements, expected behavior, or integration details needed to scope implementation.
Approach: Request concrete use cases, UX expectations, supported winbox.exe versions, and how ROS sessions should be stored and launched before defining code changes.
